it's been awhile since I last posted here. I was wondering if someone can help me with a battle cleric build. The server is Arelith, and I was hoping for the build to be PVP pref.

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
Hey Birey!

I'm sort of the Cleric specialist in the house. If you read the posting rules you'll find out that you need to provide more information about the build. Is it a meleer? A Casting Cleric? There are many ways to build one, so please be a bit more specific. For Arelith, because I know how gimpy the server is to Powerbuilds, I might suggest a Cleric 24 / Monk 3 / CoT 4 Zen Archer / Caster, but you need to be more specific.

Take it EZ!

posts.author: Maximillian Kane
posts.content:
So, I went to work and built you a very nice HACK AND SLASH machine. There is a slight problem with him, he won't be able to cast level 7 and 8 spells for a while, but the good news is, that allows him to be stronger. If you wanted to start with more Wisdom, you could lower your STR, but then there wouldn't be much to choose from with the CoT bonus feats. I know I can level this toon, the question is, can you? If you can, you'll be rewarded with GODLY combat power!

This is a simple and effective way to build a Cleric. You can choose any weapon you want, but any Martial or Exotic would require you to take a feat. If you want to do that, drop Empower Spell and take Weapon Proficiency to use whatever weapon you want, then change the Weapon Focus and Improved Critical to that weapon. You can also swap domains. If there are no perma-haste items, you can swap either domain for Travel to have access to the Haste spell. This toon is dispellable, so you need to have multiple copies of your buffs to rebuff, so you can also swap Empower Spell for Craft Wand and craft your own buffing items.

Finally, for playing tips, I would like to refer you to my Cleric guide: Click Here

Reading this guide should help you understand how you should play this class from level 1 up to maximum level and the transformation they go through from simple do nothing summoners into battlle monsters!

I hope you enjoy this build. It's VERY STRONG. trust me. Any questions, ask away and I'll be happy to answer. Take a look!
